entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a hearing and making a stag Patronus.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Susan's auntie, mentioned as telling Susan about Harry's hearing.

entities.name: susan bones
entities.description: The girl who is Madam Bones' niece and has knowledge of Harry's hearing.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: A person who is impressed by Harry's ability to make a stag Patronus.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Ron's brother, mentioned as being told not to spread the news about Harry's hearing.

entities.name: terry boot
entities.description: A person who asks Harry if he killed a basilisk with Dumbledore's sword.

entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: A person who whistles in response to Harry's answer about killing the basilisk.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: A person who says 'wow' softly in response to Harry's answer.

relationships.description: Harry does not know Madam Bones, but she told Susan about his hearing.
Lee is impressed by Harry's ability to make a stag Patronus.
Fred was told not to spread the news about Harry's hearing by his mum.
Terry Boot visited Dumbledore's office and heard a portrait tell him about Harry killing a basilisk with Dumbledore's sword.
Justin Finch-Fletchley whistles in response to Harry's answer about killing the basilisk.
Lavender Brown says 'wow' softly in response to Harry's answer.
